and review of existing national guidelines and 44 Member States requested support on how to improve 
implementation. Only five countries reported that they did not need any support and another four countries 
did not provide any information at all on this matter. Member States have also asked for WHO guidance on 
physical activity for young children, nutrition for pregnant adolescents and working women, as well as weight 
gain during pregnancy.
